Toggle navigation HOME ABOUT OUR RESORT OUR ROOMS PRICING PHOTO GALLERY LOCAL ATTRACTIONS MAP / DIRECTIONS InstanceBeginEditable name="header" InstanceEndEditable InstanceBeginEditable name="body" About Our Resort The recent rush of improvements have converted this ole' fish camp into an amenity filled, beautiful, comfortable and upscale......... Fish Camp / Resort with moderate rates! The Fishing, Boating, Swimming (in the pool), and Nature watching are a bloom of beauty from the misty morning sunrises to the mixtures of red, gold and orange blended sunsets. But one of the best things about this park is the family atmosphere. All of the guests are treated like family. Fish range from Crappie, Bluegill, Warmouth, Bass, Catfish, to an occasional salt water species drifting down in the brackish water. Pricing RV LOTS With 50 and 30 amp, sewer, cable, water WIRELESS INTERNET Bring your laptop LIVE BAIT Â Minnows, crickets, worms PETS ALLOWED Under 30 pounds MOTEL ROOMSÂ With full kitchens, A/C, cable TV, microwaves REC ROOM With internet connected computer OUTDOOR GRILLS - PICNIC TABLES - LAWN CHAIRS Â In our owner Riverside Park FISH CLEANING STATION Covered, stainless steel sinks, lights, fans, on a concrete slab POOL OPEN ALL YEARÂ Heated to a nice 82 degrees

Pricing
Special pricing is available on rental boats with a 2 night motel stay

Amenities InstanceEndEditable 2760 Botts Landing Rd.
